Lunna: Lunna loves to forage for stuff and helps you in farming. You gain +3 Foraging and +2 Farming with her at your side.
Bianka: Bianka seems to be attract a lot of things, including luck and items!. You gain +3 Luck and +2 Magnet with her at your side.
Raphael: Raphael has great experience with combat and strategy. You gain +3 Defense, +2 Attack and +2 Crafting with him at your side.
